description: This file defines a Python class YouTubeReader that reads YouTube video transcripts using the youtube_transcript_api, extracting the transcript and creating Document objects. It includes both synchronous and asynchronous methods for reading transcripts.

classes.name: YouTubeReader
classes.description: A class for reading YouTube video transcripts, inheriting from Reader, with methods to read transcripts synchronously and asynchronously.

methods.name: read
methods.description: Synchronously reads the transcript of a YouTube video given its URL, returning a list of Document objects containing the transcript text.

methods.name: async_read
methods.description: Asynchronously reads the transcript of a YouTube video given its URL, returning a list of Document objects.
